rules_text: Whenever a card is put into your hand from anywhere except the first card you draw in each of your draw steps, you gain 1 life.
special_text:
First mate – Your starting deck doesn't contain white cards. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
